name: Vanarchy
description:
In Vanarchy, you command a space battleship armed with three attacks and three defenses. It's essentially rock, paper, scissors with double the options...but in space! Created as part of a 72 hour game jam by a four member team. We have plans to expand it into an RPG if there's enough interest.

If you have Comments, Concerns, Likes check us out on facebook to see our other projects

https://www.facebook.com/ProjectVahaos
